data.name: The Unbreakable Gumball Demo
data.detailed_description:
The demo for The Unbreakable Gumball is designed to show off the concept and basic gameplay in a mini version of the game's city. It will be continually updated as the game is developed, so try it out and let us know what you think!

This demo is considered pre-alpha, and does not reflect the quality of the final product in any way!

What's in the demo?
  • A smaller version of Elysia
  • Targets to shoot
  • Rings to pass through
  • Dummies to punch
  • Original music

What's NOT in the demo?
  • AI-controlled enemies
  • Finished graphics
  • A full-sized map
  • Story missions

A VR headset is required to play the current version, but traditional screen and controller support is coming!

data.short_description: The Unbreakable Gumball is an open-world superhero game inspired by classic comic books. Jump, swing, and glide your way around the city of the future!
data.reviews:
“So much fun!!! 10/10, honestly just great!”
- Blootrix

“The most adorably bad*ss super-hero ever”
- Some guy on Reddit

“If you're having a bad day, just play this game.”
- FallGame

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5-4690K
  • Graphics: GTX 970/Radeon 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
